title: Problem to load QR code
content: For some reason I had my Firefoz restarted, and since then I can not load the QR code to access Whatsapp Web, that is a fundamental tool for me...
creator: santiagoras

title: "open image in new tab" issue
content:
I started to have this problem within the last few days. Selecting "Open image in new tab" opens a new tab but displays a very small, pixel sized white rectangle and no image is displayed.

The attached is a screenshot of the page at

https://www.mozilla.org/media/cms/images/monitor-landing-flat.width-1200.png

I dont have this issue in Chrome or DuckDuckGo browsers. I have deleted cached images, files, disabled all extensions and restarted my phone to no avail. I haven't found any relevant settings to check in my phone settings or in FFx but am I missing something? JW

Firefox V144.0.1 for Android 16 on Galaxy S24
creator: sy1cornei1ius

title: Unicamente Firefox por un minuto, de ahi enadelante no puedo continuar, se traba, esto es siempre
creator: tecnologias9999

title: Firefox, Lesezeichen (Bookmarks)
content:
Ok - My Englisch is not the yellow of the egg, But - Ich habe Probleme beim Aufräumen der Lesezeichen. (I have problems with organisation of the Bookmaks) Meine SideBar zeigt 2x den Bereich "Lesezeichen-Menü" - keine Ahnung warum. (My SideBar shows 2x the Area "Lesezeichen-Menü" - I don't know why.) Ich möche meine Lesezeichen in Ordnern organisieren (I try to organize my Bookmarks in "Folders" by theme) Aber - wenn ich die Einträge verschiebe, sind sie doppelt vorhanden. (But - if I move the entries, they appear double) Wenn ich einen der doppelten Einträge lösche, sind beide weg! (If I delete one of the double entries, they disappear both!)

Kann sein, dass ich nicht verstehe, wie das organisiert ist ... (Maybe, I don't understand the organization of the entries)

Bitte helfen Sie mir zu verstehen, wie ich das zu verstehen habe (Please help me to understand, how I should understand organization of the Bookmarks)

Ich bin kein Programmieren, habe keine Ahnung, wie ich Firefox einstellen muss ... (CSS???/JS???) (I am not a programmer, I have no idea, how to adjust Firefox 144.0 (64-Bit) - by CSS/JS)

Ich bin nur User - und mag den Chrome / Edge / Internet-Explorer nicht. (I'm only User - and I don't like Chrome / Edge / Internet-Explorer).

Bitte helfen Sie mir ... (Please help ...)

With best sunny wishes Ruth
creator: rzell

title: Security question about one website that gives me an error then goes away when I go to it
content:
when going to my website I get this error message:

Secure Connection Failed

An error occurred during a connection to analytiwave.com. PR_CONNECT_RESET_ERROR

Error code: PR_CONNECT_RESET_ERROR 

   The page you are trying to view cannot be shown because the authenticity of the received data could not be verified.    Please contact the website owners to inform them of this problem. but only on this website?  Its only on this website and have been told several reasons for it which none have worked...Any ideas?
creator: joe194

title: constant intermittent ytube 153 errors
content:
I am getting sick and tired of ytube video 153 error messages on the latest releases of Firefox when trying to access a ytube video. I use Firefox on Linux (Ubuntu and Mint) with multiple profiles and it didn't used to be this way!!

Even clearing the profile cache and history has unpredictable effect. The web is full of questions to this very issue with no definitive fix. It appears Firefox is not clearing things out properly even though the profile settings are set to delete everything upon exit.

What is the fix?? (or is there one?) A very frustrated longtime user.
creator: phoefsmit

title: HHOW to add another windows11 device to my Firefox account, when that other device-Firefox was disconnected.
content: HOW to add another windows11 device to this Firefox account,... when that other existing Firefox account was "disconnected" after my recent upgrade from Windows10 to Win11. Not successful even at logging in with existing p/w,... and the security key does not work either.Need to start over with new account on that other windows11 device, but using the same email address: inetsurf@sonic.net. Can you help me?
creator: inetsurf
